refnamediv.refpurpose: Receives an arate signal into an instrument through a named port.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Receives an arate signal into an instrument through a named port.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Sname -- String name of the inlet port. The name of the inlet is implicitly qualified by the instrument name or number, so it is valid to use the same inlet name in more than one instrument (but not to use the same inlet name twice in one instrument).

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: During performance, the arate inlet signal is received from each instance of an instrument containing an outlet port to which this inlet has been connected using the connect opcode. The signals of all the outlets connected to an inlet are summed in the inlet.
